name: Dhaka–Cox’s Bazar–Dhaka
duration: 4 Nights 3 Days (2 Nights stay at Cox's Bazar)
shortDetail: As the longest sea beach in the world, Cox’s Bazar is considered the most popular tourist destination in Bangladesh.The length of this unbroken sandy beach is 120km and it is the most enjoying place for watching the sunset closely.Equally important, the local food is very delicious, especially those who loves seafood. That is to say, you can take a bath, swim as well as play the games on the beach without any fair with your friends and families, as the beach area is the Shark free zone. In one word, it is the coolest place for enjoying your holidays or a yearly vacation. The most attractive places in Cox’s Bazar are Ramu, Laboni Beach, Enani beach, Himchari and many more.
visitedPlaces: Kalatali Beach,Laboni Beach, Sugnadha Beach, Inani Beach, Himchhari Falls, Moheshkhali Island by Boat, Dulahazara Safari Park, Sunset and Night Beach, Barmiz Market
facility: Non AC Transport, Daily Breakfast , Lunch & Diner at Local Restaurant, Hotel Accommodation Non AC (Twin/Double Share)

name: Dhaka-St. Martins Island-Dhaka
duration: 4 Nights 3 Days (2 Nights stay at Saint Martins Island)
shortDetail: St. Martin’s Island is the only coral island in Bangladesh which is also known as Narikel Jinjira or Daruchini Dwip.The island is on the 9 km south of the Cox’s Bazar-Teknaf peninsula. You will get an adjoining island with the main St. Martin’s Island called Chera Dwip. It is downright to the Naf River of Myanmar. The length and width of this small island are 6km and 0.5km.The most amazing attraction on the beach is- you can see the 20 feet deep into the sea from the crystal clear water. You can’t deny the beauty of the overall sight of the island including crystal stones, coconut groves, sea crabs, turtle shells, and pearls.
visitedPlaces: Watch The Memorable Beach Sunset,Sunrise From The Beach In Early Morning,Chhera Dwip,Beach Cycling, Beach Swimming
facility: AC Transport,Keari Cruise and Dine, Daily Breakfast , Lunch & Diner at Local Restaurant, Hotel Accommodation Non AC (Twin/Double Share)

name: Dhaka-Rangamati-Bandarban-Dhaka
duration: 4 Nights 3 Days (1 Night stay at Rangamati - 1 Night at Bandarban)
shortDetail: Rangamati is surrounded by natural features like as mountains, rivers, lakes, and waterfalls.In Bandarban, the most beautiful tourist spots are Boga Lake, Chimbuk Hill and Tribal Villages,  Buddha Dhatu Jadi, Keokradong, Nilachal Tourist Spot, Mirinja Parjatan, Meghla Tourist Spot, Nafakhum and Remakri, Nilgiri and Thanchi, Rijuk Waterfall, Prantik Lake, Sangu River, Tajingdong, Shoilo Propat, and Upabon Parjatan.
visitedPlaces: Cruise on Kaptai Lake,Subholong by Boat,Hanging Bridge,Peda Ting Ting and Tuk Tuk Eco Village,Sangu River,Swarna Mandir and Chakma Rajbari,Nilgiri,Chimbuk and Shoilopropat
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Daily Breakfast , Lunch & Diner at Local Restaurant,A/C Bus tickets,Meal Included as per our itinerary

name: Dhaka-Sundarbans-Dhaka
shortDetail: The Sundarbans is one of the largest mangrove forests and natural wonders in the world. UNESCO has listed the Sundarbans as the World Heritage List for its beauty and ongoing ecological processes. If you want to take the taste of deep forests in Bangladesh and explore the wildlife for some days, the Sundarbans tour can be your best choice.Located at the side of Bay Of Bengal, Sundarbans is the home of Royal Bengal Tigers, spotted deer, claw-less otters, salt-water crocodiles and many other wildlife species. Fortunately, the tour can bring you to see the life of a forest closely.
visitedPlaces: Cruising towards the Sundarbans Forest,Hiking in the Kotka Forest area to see wild life and forest,Jungle walk,Cruising towards Kochikhali wildlife sanctuary,Overnight on the boat at Kochikhali
facility: Hotel Accommodation Non AC (Twin/Double Share),Bar – B – Q dinner on boat,Daily Breakfast ,Lunch & Diner at Local Restaurant,A/C Bus tickets,Meal Included as per our itinerary

name: Dhaka-Sylhet-Srimongal-Dhaka
duration: 5 Days 4 Nights (2 Nights Sylhet - 2 Nights Sreemongal)
shortDetail: Sylhet – the spiritual capital of Bangladesh and popular for the waterfall, tea forest, and hilly areas.Each and every expanse of Bangladesh abounds in greenery, but none can compare with Sylhet. From spinning hills covered in lush green tea gardens and gleaming paddy fields to olive marshlands and reserved forests, Sylhet seems to have been blessed with every possible shade of green one can imagine.
visitedPlaces: Sylhet City,Jaflong,Bisnakandi,Ratargul Swamp Forest,Lawachara National Park,Lalakhal Boat Trip,Madhabpur Lake
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Daily Buffet Breakfast at Hotel,Meal Included as per our itinerary,Dhaka- Srimongol- Sylhet- Dhaka A/C Bus tickets,Daily Breakfast , Lunch & Diner at Local Restaurant

name: Dhaka-Kuakata-Dhaka
duration: 4 Nights 3 Days (2 Nights stay at Kuakata)
shortDetail: Kuakata is known for its panoramic sea beach in the world. It is situated in the southeastern part of Bangladesh. In general, it is the Second most visited tourist destination in Bangladesh. Kuakata beach is a sandy expanse 18 kilometers long and 3 kilometers wide. It is very famous for watching sunrise and sunset very closely in the wide space and water of Bay of Bengal.
visitedPlaces: Fatrar Forest, Pilgrimage, Tribal Life in the Rakhain Village, Gangamati or Gajamati Forest, Shutki Polli, Keranipara Shema Mondir, Kuakata Buddhist Temple, Kuakata Eco Park, Lebur Chor,Beauty of Sunrise and Sunset from Beach
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Daily Breakfast , Lunch & Diner at Local Restaurant,Meal Included as per our itinerary,AC Bus Ticket

name: KASHMIR PACKAGE FROM DHAKA
shortDetail: Kashmir is an epitome of natural beauty, and it is renowned the world over for that. You can soak your senses on the many lakes, gardens and hill stations that attract thousands of tourists every year.The state offers beautiful verdant mountains and valleys, religious shrines and remote mountains. The people here are warm and hospitable, and they will welcome you into their land and homes easily. Each of these regions has its own culture, and this is evident in their daily lives and also their lifestyle.
visitedPlaces: Delhi: (Nizamuddin, Jama Masjid, Parliament House, Qutubddin Aulia, Qutab Minar, India Gate, Red Fort Etc), Kashmir: (Local sight-seeing Kashmir the heavenly beauty of the state, Srinagar with its placid lakes, enchanting environs, slumbering houseboats, fascinating Mughal gardens and gorgeous flower-beds, Pahalgam (The valley of shepherds), Gulmarg - Meadow of Flowers )
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Return Air Ticket with all Travel Tax,Return Airport – Hotel – Airport Pickup and Drop Transfer,Daily Buffet Breakfast at Hotel,English Speaking Guide Service,Sightseeing as per our itinerary

name: GOA TOUR PACKAGE
shortDetail: Lying on the western coast, Goa is India's smallest state and unlike any other, known for its endless beaches, stellar nightlife, eclectic seafood, world-heritage listed architecture. Spread across just 3,702 km, Goa lies in the Konkan region. It is a far cry from the hippie haven or a beach getaway, and one of the only few destinations that is open 24x7. The laid-backness (susegad) of Goa attracts as many international tourists as it does Indians, or even more so.
visitedPlaces: Calangute Beach, Fort Aguada, Cruise in Goa, Water Sports in Goa, Dudhsagar Falls, Chapora Fort, Baga Beach, Butterfly Beach, Divar Island.
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Dhaka – Kolkata – Dhaka AC Bus Ticket,Daily Buffet Breakfast at Hotel,English Speaking Guide Service,Sightseeing as per our itinerary

name: DHAKA - ANDAMAN ISLAND
shortDetail: Replete with turquoise blue water beaches and a bit of history, Andaman & Nicobar Islands is a little slice of paradise tucked around 1,400 km away from the east coast of mainland India. Port Blair, the capital of this union territory, has a major airport and seaport connected with the rest of the country and with various tourist islands via multiple daily ferries. Havelock and Neil Islands are popular among tourists for their white sandy beaches and excellent diving options.
visitedPlaces: Radhanagar Beach, The Cellular Jail, Ross Island, Elephant beach, Scuba Diving In Andaman, Howrah Bridge - Andaman, Laxmanpur Beach.
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Return Air Ticket with all Travel Tax,Return Airport – Hotel – Airport Pickup and Drop Transfer,Daily Buffet Breakfast at Hotel,English Speaking Guide Service,Sightseeing as per our itinerary

name: Italy France & Switzerland
shortDetail: The second smallest continent in the world, Europe covers 2% of the Earth’s surface and 6.7% of the Earth’s land. With 47 countries and a population of 742.5 million (2013 census), it is the third most populated continent in the world. Bordered by the Atlantic Ocean on the west, Arctic Ocean on the north, Ural mountains in the east, and the Mediterranean Sea to the South, a visit to the European continent is visually magnificent and historically significant.
visitedPlaces: Radhanagar Beach, The Cellular Jail, Ross Island, Elephant beach, Scuba Diving In Andaman, Howrah Bridge - Andaman, Laxmanpur Beach.
facility: Hotel Accommodation (3* Hotel & Twin Basis),Return Air Ticket with all Travel Tax,Return Airport – Hotel – Airport Pickup and Drop Transfer,Daily Buffet Breakfast at Hotel,English Speaking Guide Service,Sightseeing as per our itinerary
